lockerSettings.title: Locker Settings
lockerSettings.imageQuality.description: Set the quality of displayed images. Higher quality means larger file sizes.
lockerSettings.imageWidth.description: Set the maximum width for displayed images in pixels.
lockerSettings.imageHeight.description: Set the maximum height for displayed images in pixels.

description.title: What is LockerZ?
description.subtitle: Your Personal Image Organization Solution
description.content1: LockerZ is a simple image organization tool designed to help artists their visual references efficiently.
description.content2: With LockerZ, you can easily categorize, search, and access your image collection, better way to finding a ref if you got a image in your own pc.
description.content3: Whether you're working on concept art, gather idea ,finding a ref, etc.. or just need a better way to organize your inspiration, LockerZ has got you covered.
